<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Severed Head](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1077)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most common beheaded appears simply as a rotting head, barely preserved by the magic that created it.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Severed Head](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1077)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 30</row>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 7
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
positive 1

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Gnash** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The beheaded's previous action was a jaws Strike that dealt damage to its target; **Effect** The severed head makes a second jaws Strike as it violently shakes itself, trying to rip away a mouthful of flesh. On a success, the target takes an additional 1d4 slashing damage and 1 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>
